Package main

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
main.RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent extends Object
Represents a random event that can occur in the game. It can result in a stat increase for a team member, a team member quitting, or a new athlete joining the team.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RandomEvent(GameEnvironment game, PurchasableManager market)
    Creates a random event in the game.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getEventMessage()
    Returns the random event message, telling the user what has happened

    newAthlete()
    Simulates a new athlete randomly joining the team.
    void
    randomQuit()
    Simulates a team member randomly quitting the team.
    void
    statIncrease()
    Increases the offence and defence ratings of a randomly selected team member.

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomEvent

      public RandomEvent(GameEnvironment game, PurchasableManager market)
      Creates a random event in the game.
      Parameters:
      game - the game environment
      market - where the available athletes are stored

  • Method Details

    • statIncrease

      public void statIncrease()
      Increases the offence and defence ratings of a randomly selected team member.

    • randomQuit

      public void randomQuit()
      Simulates a team member randomly quitting the team. The probability of quitting depends on various factors such as injury status.

    • newAthlete

      public void newAthlete()
      Simulates a new athlete randomly joining the team. The probability of joining depends on various factors such as the size of the reserve team.

    • getEventMessage

      public String getEventMessage()
      Returns the random event message, telling the user what has happened
      Returns:
      the random event message
